messages: 57debd3f29e397a387b4cb6bfd0e5a90 (21:38): is there anyway to tell whether geolocation is shared by the browser
57debd3f29e397a387b4cb6bfd0e5a90 (21:39): maybe i can use the timestamp

57debd3f29e397a387b4cb6bfd0e5a90 (21:55): 29638865cc2212219a29c1d1792eadef: I mean I want to know if the callback was triggered because the user clicked on "share position" in the browser or if it was automatically triggered because the user previously shared it and checker Always share with this website
29638865cc2212219a29c1d1792eadef (21:55): that would be useful information indeed
460c9b7ea5b2f6acd9c60fb47db6f8fe (22:08): Hi. Just wondering, if you have a document with xhtml transitionnal doctype, you technically can't use the <video> tag even if the browser supports it right?
bdedc97e25dde1328bae6e2d092691c8 (22:08): Hey guys, giving a talk in NYC tonight on doing graphical coolness in IE<9
bdedc97e25dde1328bae6e2d092691c8 (22:08): Please come and do some community crap hosted by TheLadders.com: http://www.meetup.com/refreshnyc/events/16247095/
bdedc97e25dde1328bae6e2d092691c8 (22:09): Or if you want to join in remotely: https://www2.gotomeeting.com/join/683985954
6a8ca7ce228632a45b077b5398962bf2 (22:09): bdedc97e25dde1328bae6e2d092691c8: Noticed how I do gradients in IE6/7/8?
6a8ca7ce228632a45b077b5398962bf2 (22:10): via putImageData emulation via BMP data uri
6a8ca7ce228632a45b077b5398962bf2 (22:10): bdedc97e25dde1328bae6e2d092691c8: Why http://www 6a8ca7ce228632a45b077b5398962bf2alitz.org/gameboy/ works just *barely* in IE8
6a8ca7ce228632a45b077b5398962bf2 (22:11): Really should be a separate lib on github
6a8ca7ce228632a45b077b5398962bf2 (22:12): lets use blit a raw array as an image in IE8
bdedc97e25dde1328bae6e2d092691c8 (22:12): 6a8ca7ce228632a45b077b5398962bf2: That's really cool, you should fork ExplorerCanvas
6a8ca7ce228632a45b077b5398962bf2 (22:13): ExplorerCanvas has *buggy* stapled all over it
bdedc97e25dde1328bae6e2d092691c8 (22:13): 6a8ca7ce228632a45b077b5398962bf2: Indeed. I am recommending Rapha?´l in my talk
6a8ca7ce228632a45b077b5398962bf2 (22:14): Damn, I can't type for shit
6a8ca7ce228632a45b077b5398962bf2 (22:15): IE8 just got some putImageData y'all
6a8ca7ce228632a45b077b5398962bf2 (22:16): bdedc97e25dde1328bae6e2d092691c8: This is better than VRML, because you can draw anything
6a8ca7ce228632a45b077b5398962bf2 (22:16): You just have to do a lot of array math in js
6a8ca7ce228632a45b077b5398962bf2 (22:16): and compute all your gfx in js
6a8ca7ce228632a45b077b5398962bf2 (22:18): The magic is on line https://github.com 6a8ca7ce228632a45b077b5398962bf2alitz/GameBoy-Online/blob/master/js/other/BMPCanvas.js#L157
6a8ca7ce228632a45b077b5398962bf2 (22:19): FYI, the lib I wrote "tiles", so you can blit images > 32kb in IE8
bdedc97e25dde1328bae6e2d092691c8 (22:19): Doesn't sound like a cakewalk, but it could be a super-valuable polyfill
6a8ca7ce228632a45b077b5398962bf2 (22:19): Since IE8 has a 32kb limit on data uris I believe
6a8ca7ce228632a45b077b5398962bf2 (22:19): But no limit on how many
6a8ca7ce228632a45b077b5398962bf2 (22:19): someone could make a google maps replica out of it
bdedc97e25dde1328bae6e2d092691c8 (22:21): 6a8ca7ce228632a45b077b5398962bf2: I like the idea of SVG/VML for Maps
bdedc97e25dde1328bae6e2d092691c8 (22:21): 6a8ca7ce228632a45b077b5398962bf2: The vector graphics in the Android version are tops
6a8ca7ce228632a45b077b5398962bf2 (22:21): Watch out for the brainfuck inside BMPCanvas.prototype.putImageData
6a8ca7ce228632a45b077b5398962bf2 (22:22): 5 for loops nested inside each other
19685048ab49226517b9e214a6e971f6 (22:23): anyone here ever work with this? http://maps.gstatic.com/intl/en_ALL/mapfiles/250a/maps2.api/main.js

19685048ab49226517b9e214a6e971f6 (22:24): somewhere along line null ref is being passed, goog then does a parseInt on it, sends NaN back to us but can't figure out what arg we're passing thats causing it
6a8ca7ce228632a45b077b5398962bf2 (22:24): and what are the functions you're using?
